name: UnofficialHawthornHawksPlayerBios
0:
”Alexa, open Unofficial Hawks Player bios”
”Tell me about Tom Mitchell”
”Tell me about Jack Gunston”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: unofficial hawks player bios
des:
The Unofficial Hawthorn Hawks Player Bios skill will provide a list of Hawks players and ask the user if they want to hear the biography of any of the listed players.
If the user agrees and says something like “Tell me about Tom Mitchell” the skill will read a short biography corresponding to the chosen player if he is in the list. If the user decides that the topic is too boring, they can reply with “No” and the skill will close. The name of our skill is “Unofficial Hawthorn Hawks Player Bios.”
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
